issue.title: Jenkins error: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

content.raw:
The problem is the size of the log in the nvidia gazebo build. Seems like the issue [has been reported upstream](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-12830).

What's going on to solve the problem:

  * The good conditional step plugin can not be use since we change the status of the build in post-build actions (cppcheck, warnings or tests)
  * Run java process with 512m of memory in a [testing run](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/190/console), only in the optimus node (the setting needs to be configured in the node filesystem).
  * Implementing an orchestration model to convert the current monolitic job into a set of jobs that can easily be triggered and don't depend on parsing the log.
